content.question: The laws excerpted most directly contributed to which of the following developments in the English colonies during the 1600s?

choices.label: The development of a more rigid social hierarchy
Continued growth in the indentured servant population
A decline in the African population in English colonies
A fluid relationship between English colonists, Africans, and American Indians

content.answer: The development of a more rigid social hierarchy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
